site_title: SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 18 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. It is also the winner of the first international paper airplane contest in 1967. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 017 : Jumping Jack by Andrew Dewar", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/1LrKfI3oVfs Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Dr. James M. Sakoda
block_list.body:
• Eight-Point Star by Dr. James M. Sakoda
  • SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda
